serviceFees.COMMENT: Service Fees (in BKC/Ether) üí∞: Defines the cost, in BKC tokens, for a user to perform a specific action. The value is in decimal format.

pStakeMinimums.COMMENT: pStake Minimum (Raw Value) üîí: The MINIMUM amount of 'power stake' (pStake) a user must have delegated to be authorized to use a service.

stakingFees.COMMENT: Staking Fees & Penalties (in BIPS) üìâ: Defines penalties and fees for unstaking or claiming rewards. 100 BIPS = 1%.

ammTaxFees.COMMENT: NFT Sale Tax (in BIPS) üí∏: Defines the total tax charged when a user SELLS an NFT back to the pool.

boosterDiscounts.COMMENT: NFT Booster Discounts (in BIPS) ‚≠ê: Defines the discount (in BIPS) that each NFT Booster Tier grants on system fees/penalties.

miningDistribution.COMMENT: PoP Mining Distribution (in BIPS) ‚õèÔ∏è: Newly minted tokens. REFACTORED: TREASURY + DELEGATOR_POOL MUST = 10000.

feeDistribution.COMMENT: Fee Distribution (in BIPS) üíµ: Original fee tokens. REFACTORED: TREASURY + DELEGATOR_POOL MUST = 10000.
